preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This package adds the necessary framework enable the communication between the OTRS iPhone App and the OTRS system.
It is necessary to first install the iPhoneHandle package before setup the iPhone App.
If you have questions regarding this package, please contact your support team (support@otrs.com) for more information.

sect1.title: Badges
sect1.para: Counters for Locked, Watched, Responsible displayed in iPhone application main screen.

sect2.title: Queue View
sect2.para: All necessary information to fill iPhone application "Queue View" including Queue names and number of viewable tickets.

sect2.title: Status View
sect2.para: All necessary information to fill iPhone application "Status View" including State names and number of viewable tickets.

sect2.title: Escalation View
sect2.para: All necessary information to fill iPhone application "Escalation View" including Today, Tomorrow and Next Week escalation times and number of viewable tickets.

sect2.title: Watched View
sect2.para: All necessary information to fill iPhone application "Watched View" including Queue names and number of viewable watched tickets.

sect2.title: Locked View
sect2.para: All necessary information to fill iPhone application "Locked View" including Queue names and number of viewable locked tickets.

sect2.title: Responsible View
sect2.para: All necessary information to fill iPhone application "Locked View" including Queue names and number of viewable responsible for tickets.

sect2.title: Ticket Note
sect2.para: Create a new note to an existing ticket.

sect2.title: Ticket Move
sect2.para: Change an existing ticket from one queue to another.

sect1.title: Framework
sect1.para: The following OTRS Framework is required:
$Framework

sect1.title: Packages
sect1.para: The following packages are required:
$PackageRequired

sect1.title: Operating System
sect1.para: The package can be used with the following operating systems:
$OS

sect1.title: Third Party Software
sect1.para: The following software is required for the operation of the package:

chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: The following instructions show how to install the package. There are basically two options: either through the admin interface or via the command line.

sect1.title: Admin Interface
sect1.para:
The package can be installed, updated or uninstalled using the following URL through the admin interface (make sure that the user is in the admin group):
http://localhost/otrs/index.pl?Action=AdminPackageManager

sect1.title: Command Line
sect1.para: If it is not possible to use the admin interface, the following command line tool ("/bin/otrs.PackageManager.pl") can be used.

sect1.title: In OTRS web application
sect1.para: As soon as the iPhoneHandle Module has been installed, a new group of settings "iPhone" is automatically generated. access them via "sysconfig". this group of settings controls the behavior of iPhone ticket action screens as well as some debug options of the package itself.
Another group of settings "Z_iPhone_Deprecated" is also added, this settings contain information about old configurations needed to upgrade from version 1.0.x to 1.1.x.
Is recommended to review all this settings and change them if necessary to match the current OTRS configuration.

sect1.title: In the iPhone application
sect1.para: Download and install OTRS App from iTunes Store or App Store application in your iPhone or iPod Touch.
Add a new OTRS account in the OTRS App Account Manager. The URL must be http(s)://<FQDN>/<ScriptAlias>/json.pl.

note.para: Please change FQDN and ScriptAlias to match your current environment.

example.title: URL example: FQDN = localhost, ScriptAlias = otrs

sect1.para: You should use same User and Password in OTRS web application
iPhone, iPod Touch and iTunes are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

chapter.title: Configuration
chapter.para: The following configuration options can or need to be changed via SysConfig.

sect1.title: iPhone::DebugLog
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Core::Log.
Allows to enable a special log for all communication between iPhone and OTRS.

sect1.title: iPhone::LogFile
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Core::Log.
Defines the path and file name for the debug log file. This file will be automatically created by the system, if it doesn't exist.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###TicketType
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Sets the ticket type of new phone tickets in the iPhone interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###Service
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Sets the service of new phone tickets in the iPhone interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###Owner
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Sets the ticket owner in the new phone ticket screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###Responsible
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Sets the responsible agent of the ticket in the new phone ticket screen of the iPhone interface..

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###CustomerID
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Sets the customer id in the new phone ticket screen of the iPhone interface..

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###State
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Allows to set a new ticket state in the new phone ticket ticket screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###StateDefault
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Sets the default next state for new phone tickets in the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###PriorityDefault
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Defines the default ticket priority in the new phone ticket screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###ArticleTypeDefault
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Defines the default type of the ticket in the new phone ticket screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###SenderType
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Sets the default sender type for new phone ticket in the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###TimeUnits
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Sets the time units in the new phone ticket screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###TicketFreeText
sect1.para: Group: Z_iPhone_Deprecated, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
DEPRECATED! This setting is not used any more and will be removed in a future version of OTRS.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###TicketFreeTime
sect1.para: Group: Z_iPhone_Deprecated, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
DEPRECATED! This setting is not used any more and will be removed in a future version of OTRS.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###ArticleFreeText
sect1.para: Group: Z_iPhone_Deprecated, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
DEPRECATED! This setting is not used any more and will be removed in a future version of OTRS.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###HistoryType
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Defines the history type for the new phone ticket screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###HistoryComment
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Defines the history comment for the new phone ticket screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###DynamicField
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone.
Dynamic fields shown in the new phone ticket screen of the iPhone interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Enabled and required.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Permission
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Required permissions to use the ticket note screen in the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###RequiredLock
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.

Defines if a ticket lock is required in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###TicketType
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Sets the ticket type in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Service
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Sets the service in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Owner
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Sets the ticket owner in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Responsible
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Sets the responsible agent of the ticket in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###State
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
If a note is added by an agent, sets the state of a ticket in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###StateType
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Defines the next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###StateDefault
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Defines the default next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Note
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Allows adding notes in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Subject
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Sets the default subject for notes added in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Body
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Sets the default body text for notes added in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###ArticleTypeDefault
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Defines the default type of the note in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###ArticleTypes
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Specify the different note types, that you want to use in your system.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Priority
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Shows the ticket priority options in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###PriorityDefault
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Defines the default ticket priority in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###Title
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Shows the title fields in the ticket note screen of the iphone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###TimeUnits
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Sets the time units in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###TicketFreeText
sect1.para: Group: Z_iPhone_Deprecated, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
DEPRECATED! This setting is not used any more and will be removed in a future version of OTRS.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###TicketFreeTime
sect1.para: Group: Z_iPhone_Deprecated, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###ArticleFreeText
sect1.para: Group: Z_iPhone_Deprecated, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
DEPRECATED! This setting is not used any more and will be removed in a future version of OTRS.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###HistoryType
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Defines the history type for the ticket note screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###HistoryComment
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Defines the history comment for the ticket note screen action, which gets used for ticket history in the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###DynamicField
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote.
Dynamic fields shown in the ticket note screen of the iPhone interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Enabled and required.

sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
Required permissions to use the ticket compose screen in the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketCompose###RequiredLock
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose

Defines if a ticket lock is required in the ticket compose screen of the iPhone interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketCompose###State
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
If a note is added by an agent, sets the state of a ticket if it is composed / answered in the ticket compose screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketCompose###StateDefault
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
Defines the default next state of a ticket if it is composed / answered in the ticket compose screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketCompose###StateType
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
Defines the next possible states after composing / answering a ticket in the ticket compose screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketCompose###ComposeAddCustomerAddress
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
Adds customers email addresses to recipients in the ticket compose screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketCompose###ComposeReplaceSenderAddress
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
Replaces the original sender with current customer's email address on compose answer in the ticket compose screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.title: iPhone::Frontend::AgentTicketCompose###ComposeExcludeCcRecipients
sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
Uses Cc recipients in reply Cc list on compose an email answer in the ticket compose screen of the iPhone interface.

sect1.para: Group: iPhone, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
Sets the time units in the ticket compose screen of the iPhone interface.

chapter.title: Manifest

sect1.title: File List
sect1.para: $Filelist
